attributes.action: Kids who born in Britain needs give automatically British citizenship.
attributes.additional_details: We need work together. Young people and kuds don't need prof they settlement status if they are born in UK.
attributes.background: Kids who born in Britain needs give automatically British citizenship. But sadly still home office refuse to do so. We need bring up this to house commons. So many kids still don't have settlement status. Home Office should not ask for that. We need to work together and stop this for all.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582742
